nodes.text: In 3643 BBY, at Dromund Kaas, Sith Lord Zash assigned her apprentice to acquire a relic on Darth Skotia's bunker that would help them against Zash's nemesis, Darth Skotia. The Apprentice infiltrated the bunker eventually acquiring the Trandoshan relic slewing all Skotia's forces in the process, including the Sith Lord Ogathu.

In 3643 BBY, the Sith Lord Zash's new apprentice arrived on Dromund Kaas, capital of the Sith Empire. She told him about the ongoing conflict with Darth Skotia, her own superior. She wanted him dead as he was preventing her from achieving her plans so she sent her apprentice to infiltrate Darth Skotia's bunker and retrieve an artifact, the Trandoshan relic, which would be of use in the future duel with Skotia. First, however, he'd have to get the bunker's plans from a rebellious slave group near the bunker. The Apprentice complied so, and easily acquired the plans from the rebel slaves after slaughtering them.

The Apprentice reached the bunker's entrance and started fighting off Darth Skotia's Guard, a considerable force which Skotia had been amassing inside. The relic was in Skotia's own reliquary which was well closed. The Apprentice moved on to destroy several monitoring stations to disable the reliquary's locks. Each of the stations was personally guarded by one of Skotia's Sith apprentice but they were easily killed. After succeeding in destroying the stations and leaving a path of dead corpses behind, the Apprentice moved on to enter the reliquary but there was however one obstacle. Lord Ogathu was protecting the entrance and they fought to determine the Relic's fate. The Apprentice came victorious mortally wounding Ogathu and proceeded with retrieving the relic. However, Ogathu managed to recover and attempted to strike at the Apprentice, only to be killed by the latter by force lightning. The Apprentice then left the bunker.

The relic would later be used in the duel with Darth Skotia where it turned Skotia's own Trandoshan acolytes and bodyguards against him. The acolytes were easily killed off but had their use for distracting Skotia enough time so the Apprentice could approach him and use the other much more effective weapon.

The mission to Darth Skotia's bunker appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. The mission represents the events of the Sith Inquisitor class story mission "At the Foot of the Colossus", where the player is sent by Lord Zash, to retrieve a trandoshan relic that would help them defeat Darth Skotia. It also partially includes the side quest "Bunker Busting", where Darth Skotia is amassing an army in the bunker and the player is assigned to destroy it.
